Attention! You are closing a game that has already started. Save your game to continue playing later.

Welcome to MasterMind! 
In this game, you have two difficulty modes to choose from: Easy and Normal. 
Easy Mode: In this mode, the secret sequence is made up of 5 different colors without repetition. 
Normal Mode: In this mode, the secret sequence consists of 5 colors, and some repetitions are possible. 
Your goal is to guess the secret sequence in as few tries as possible. 
Each time you make an attempt, you will receive feedback on which colors are correct in the right position (light blue) and which colors are correct but in the wrong position (dark blue). 
Win the game by guessing the secret sequence before you run out of lives. 
Good luck and have fun playing MasterMind!
